Erie Outing Club

A social outdoor Group in the Erie, Pa area

About the Erie Outing Club

We are a Social non-competive Outdoors Club. We go camping, hiking, backpacking, cycling,kayaking. We also get together and eat together. We love socializing and talking about our favorite outdoor activities. We will go camping for the weekend and go backpacking , cycling or kayaking. In the winter time we go cross-country skiing and snowshoeing

Below are some examples of the trip we do.

  • Day hike Chautauqua gorge-
  • Fri.-Sun. -Buckaloon Camping and Kayaking
  • -White Turkey Bike ride in Conneaut, Ohio
  • Cross-Country Skiing at Red House or Wilderness Lodge

Services we offer

We are a all volunteer Group. Our members put the events we do. It could be a ride around the Pennisula and lunch afterward,or go Warren Pa to do a kayaking weekend and camping.

Erie Outing Club Calendar

Erie Outing Club Membership Meeting

Monthly Meeting are the third Wednesday of the month month Wed Sep 18, 7:00 PM at the Unitarian Universalist Church.
